title: Alcohol Reaction Master: Card Game-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organic chemistry concepts (structural formulas, functional groups, reaction types)
context.additional_context: Students progress while reviewing responsive mechanism supplementary materials on personal devices (tablets/smartphones).

learning_goals: Learners can explain alcohol substitution and elimination reaction mechanisms with 80% accuracy
Reaction pathways based on conditions (temperature, solvent, substrate structure) can be predicted with over 70% accuracy
Learners can analyze and explain factors influencing competitive reaction (SN1/SN2/E1/E2) selectivity through card game simulations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
